Personalized search

By switching on Personalized Search, a user can choose to be identified by airlines. In this case airlines will be able to:

  • Return either pre-negociated or on the fly packages and tailored upgrade options.
  • Return deals as per the traveller preference and status, taking into account frequent flyer details, preferred payment mechanisms, seat preferences and preferred ancillaries.

Travel managers (admins) can control the level of personalization allowed and/or choose to switch off this feature and opt for purely anonymous search. Corporate rates can get returned regardless of the mode.

Compare alternatives

  • Select two or more options per leg for comparison and then click the filter here to allow detailed comparison.
  • A comparison matrix then enables one to fully compare these options across all aspects of interest.

Rich content

Users have access to rich information about any available flight. This enables the following:

  • A like-for-like comparison of alternatives through clear visibility of product features and the ability to filter options by desired ancillaries.
  • Increased productivity with easy fare and product comparison.
  • An improved shopping experience, since NDC enables a range of media types to be returned (images, descriptions and even video).
  • Easier access to new producs (within policy) as they become available from the airline.
  • The bundling and creation of unique products by suppliers (e.g. airline plus Netflix or Spotify etc).

Travel managers (admins) can control the level of access to this rich content in the Admin section.

  • Price
  • Departure
  • Arrival
  • Duration
  • Personal
  • Emission

Included ancillaries

Ancillaries that are bundled into the price are clearly listed. Users can:

  • Enjoy a like-for-like comparison of alternatives.
  • Access to detailed information about the ancillaries (with images and galleries of images being available).

Purchase optional ancillaries (unbundled fares)

  • NDC provides rich content and clear indications of included and optional ancillaries.
  • Travel bookers can select and purchase one or more optional ancillaries.
  • Optional ancillaries can be selected here or on check-out or on the road.
  • The total price is dynamically updated allowing for like-for-like comparison of alternatives.
  • Travel managers/admin users can control who gets access to optional ancillaries through Policy configuration.
  • Airlines can better showcase their product and unique offerings.

Personalized shopping

  • Just-for-you specials can be pre-configured through supplier negotiations that leverage rich information on traveller behavior.
  • Travel buyers can create tailored corporate agreements with suppliers.
  • The specials can also created on-the-fly by suppliers wanting to reward travellers who meet a profile.
  • The user is never worse off as an improved traveller experience gets created.

  • Access to detailed information about the ancillaries (with images and galleries of images being available).

Purchase optional ancillaries (unbundled fares)

  • NDC provides rich content and clear indications of included and optional ancillaries.
  • Travel bookers can select and purchase one or more optional ancillaries.
  • Optional ancillaries can be selected here or on check-out or on the road.
  • The total price is dynamically updated allowing for like-for-like comparison of alternatives.
  • Travel managers/admin users can control who gets access to optional ancillaries through Policy configuration.
  • Airlines can better showcase their product and unique offerings.

Personalized shopping

  • Just-for-you specials can be pre-configured through supplier negotiations that leverage rich information on traveller behavior.
  • Travel buyers can create tailored corporate agreements with suppliers.
  • The specials can also created on-the-fly by suppliers wanting to reward travellers who meet a profile.
  • The user is never worse off as an improved traveller experience gets created.
